column4: Hello. I try to play a DVD and I use VLC, I choose subtitles but when I click "play" vlc stops! Totem doesn't work at all! What can I do or try? Is there any good program to play dvd movies in ubuntu?
does a dvd play at all?
see i never quti got install manualy from terminal
Yes but not the ones I want to. I have tried other DVD's that play just fine
